Sentencas: Nanostructured coatings are fabricated for potential use as electrodes in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) by developing innovative plasma spraying methods.
Titulo: Nanostructured functional layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The nanostructured NiO+YSZ anodes are fabricated by three means: spraying of presynthesized agglomerates of nanoparticles, suspension dc plasma spraying and solution precursor dc plasma spraying.
Titulo: Nanostructured functional layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Cathode deposits of variety of chemical composition having nanostructure were fabricated by thermal plasma chemical vapor deposition (TP-CVD) using RF-plasma torch.
Titulo: Nanostructured functional layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The deposits of desired phase and microstructure were successfully produced.
Titulo: Nanostructured functional layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The nanostructured anode, fabricated by presynthesized agglomerates of nanoparticles, exhibited better gas permeability, comparable high temperature conductivity and 43% lower polarization in SOFC operation at 800 degrees C compared with conventional anodes.
Titulo: Nanostructured functional layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, by controlling the electrode structure, the nanostructure of anode could be maintained for 1500 h of operation.
Titulo: Nanostructured functional layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Further improvement in the microstructure of anodes is in progress using dc plasma suspension and solution precursor spraying.
Titulo: Nanostructured functional layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Cathodes obtained from thermal plasma chemical vapor deposition (TPCVD) exhibited initially undesirable secondary phases, which were overcome by adjusting the chemical composition of the precursors.
Titulo: Nanostructured functional layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The deposit columnar structure had high open porosity and specific surface area.
Titulo: Nanostructured functional layers for solid oxide fuel cells
Nanostructured functional layers for solid oxide fuel cells
